body:
https://docs.python.org/3/whatsnew/3.9.html

Successfully installed Python 3.9.0 on macOS 10.15.7 with Apple Clang 12.0.0.

Also made sure that patches apply to all new versions added.

Like Anaconda and Homebrew, we still default to Python 3.8 until Python 3.9 becomes more stable.

@skosukhin
title: Python: add v3.9.0
